Term.Name: Roles
Term.Annotation: Use this annotation to declare roles that may be referenced in application code, but not specified in other annotations.

Term.Name: ServiceUserRoles
Term.Annotation: User must belong to one or more of these roles to be permitted to access the OData service.

Term.Name: ViewMetricsRoles
Term.Annotation: User must belong to one or more of these roles to be permitted to access the OData metrics.

Term.Name: ReadWriteRoles
Term.Annotation: User must belong to one or more of these roles to be permitted to access (read or write) entities in the entity set. Can be overridden by the more specific ReadRoles, WriteRoles, CreateRoles, UpdateRoles and DeleteRoles.

Term.Name: ReadRoles
Term.Annotation: User must belong to one or more of these roles to be permitted to read entities from the entity set.

Term.Name: WriteRoles
Term.Annotation: User must belong to one or more of these roles to be permitted to write (create, update, or delete) entities in the entity set. Can be overridden by the more specific CreateRoles, UpdateRoles and DeleteRoles.

Term.Name: CreateRoles
Term.Annotation: User must belong to one or more of these roles to be permitted to create entities in the entity set.

Term.Name: UpdateRoles
Term.Annotation: User must belong to one or more of these roles to be permitted to update entities in the entity set.

Term.Name: DeleteRoles
Term.Annotation: User must belong to one or more of these roles to be permitted to delete entities from the entity set.

Term.Name: InvokeRoles
Term.Annotation: User must belong to one or more of these roles to be permitted to invoke this action or function.
